meanings.sent1: She decided to upgaze at the stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: I often upgaze at the tall trees in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to upgaze at the birds on the roof but kept slipping.
meanings.sent4: As she upgazed at the towering mountain, she felt a sense of awe.
meanings.sent5: The child's eyes widened as he upgazed at the colorful hot air balloons.

meanings.sent1: His constant upgaze made him bump into things on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent2: The beauty of the sunset captured everyone's attention, drawing their upgaze.
meanings.sent3: The upgaze of the giraffe made it seem like it was always looking at the sky.
meanings.sent4: The upgaze of the audience towards the fireworks created a magical atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The upgaze of the child at the towering giraffe was filled with wonder.
